pt.uc.dei.mobilerobotsimulator

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.uc.dei.mobilerobotsimulator.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Agent, Object

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity is abstract class and super class of Agent and Object. This class contains a unique identifier, a color, a geometric shape (for the sake of simplicity, only the well known geometric forms such as triangular, pentagonal, etc., are assumed), and a pair (x,y) of coordinates in the matrix environment.
    Author:
    Karin Piškur (2014190802) and Pedro de Oliveira Estêvão (2011157312)

        Parameters:

        color - color of the entity
        shape - shape of the entity
        coordX - coordinate X of entity's location
        coordY - coordinate Y of entity's location
